price: Every sign We showed them was greater than the one before it[16], and We seized them with punishment[17] so that they may turn in repentance.
arabic: وَمَا نُرِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٍ إِلَّا هِيَ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ أُخۡتِهَاۖ وَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes:
[16] i.e., the bright hand and the staff turning into a serpent. See 20:17-22.
 [17] i.e., the famine, scarcity of crops, floods, locusts, lice, frogs, and blood. See 7:130-133.
